title: FSX - Real Environment Xtreme
description:
Highly anticipated, this package offers unchallenged graphical features no other addon even comes close to (e.g. Flight Environment)

This package includes the retail REX installer, just seperated from the Download tool normally required (so also no activation is needed).


Not much more to say , if you never heard of it before, check their website to see how incredible REX is:
 <a href="
http://www.realenvironmentxtreme.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.realenvironmentxtreme.com/</a>

Installation:
Just launch the
rex_rtm_20081128.msi

and install to a folder of your choice (does NOT have to be your FSX folder!)

Afterwards, just launch the rex.exe to configurate REX to your personal taste. Just follow the Setup wizard or, if problems occur, consult the manual.

Wish you fun with REX!

If you like this package, BUY it. The developers require the financial support of their community, and this is one of the few addons which are really worth every penny (like FSPassengers, for example). They ultimately enhance FSX and provide unlimited time of extra fun.
